title: Improve Your Handwriting- Sassoon [PDF] [StormRG]
description:
Improve Your Handwriting (Teach Yourself)
Author: Rosemary Sassoon & Gunnlaugur SE Briem
Published: 2011
Publisher: Hodder & Stoughton
ISBN: 9781444103793
Format: Retail PDF
Reader Required:Adobe Reader, Foxit, Nitro, Adobe Digital Editions

 
Written by a world-renowned expert on handwriting and a professional calligrapher, specifically for adults who are experiencing problems with their writing, this book uses self-diagnosis tests to help identify the problem before encouraging readers to experiment and choose the style that suits them best. Covering everything from holding a pen to the difficulties that left-handers face and the problems that may be caused by medical conditions, readers walk away from the book armed with the ability to write with ease and confidence.
